Title: US sends USS Wasp assault ship and Marines to eastern Mediterranean
Description: U.S. moves USS Wasp and Marines to Eastern Mediterranean as tensions continue to rise between Israel and Hezbollah

Title: Judge orders hearing to consider tossing key evidence in Trump classified docs case
Description: The judge in Donald Trump's classified documents case has ordered another hearing to determine if evidence used by prosecutors is protected by attorney-client privilege.

Title: Oklahoma state superintendent orders schools to teach the Bible
Description: Oklahoma's top education official is ordering public schools to incorporate the Bible into lessons for grades 5 through 12

Title: Walgreens to close 'significant' number of struggling US stores, CEO says
Description: One out of every 4 stores in the U.S. is underperforming, Walgreens said.

Title: 1 teen dead, 2 others rescued from Lake Michigan in apparent drowning
Description: One 17-year-old was found dead and two others were rescued in Lake Michigan after they became distressed in the water while swimming.

Title: Trial date set in University of Idaho murders
Description: A trial date of June 2, 2025, has been set for Bryan Kohberger, the man accused of killing four University of Idaho students in an off-campus house.

Title: Oregon wildfire grows to nearly 4,000 acres, prompting new evacuations
Description: A wind-driven wildfire that ignited in Central Oregon has spread nearly 4,000 acres and is threatening homes.

Title: Marilyn Monroe's former Los Angeles home declared a historic monument to save it from demolition
Description: Fans of Marilyn Monroe have won a battle to preserve her mark on Los Angeles and are a step closer to seeing a towering statue of the silver screen icon remain in Palm Springs

Title: Officials evacuate area after train derails in suburban Chicago
Description: Emergency officials have ordered a brief evacuation after a freight train derailed in suburban Chicago

Title: Uber and Lyft agree to pay drivers $32.50 per hour in Massachusetts settlement
Description: Massachusetts Attorney General Andrea Campbell says drivers for Uber and Lyft will earn a minimum pay standard of $32.50 per hour under a settlement

Title: North Carolina's restrictions on public mask-wearing are now law after key revisions
Description: North Carolina's contentious restrictions on public mask-wearing are now law after Senate Republicans voted to override Democratic Gov. Roy Cooper's veto

Title: DOJ charges nearly 200 people in $2.7 billion health care fraud schemes crackdown
Description: The Justice Department has charged nearly 200 people in a sweeping crackdown on health care fraud schemes nationwide with false claims topping $2.7 billion

Title: Biden's biggest weakness -- his age -- on full display at debate: ANALYSIS
Description: From the earliest moments of the night, President Joe Biden's biggest political weakness -- his age and perceived frailty -- became a clear liability on the debate stage.

Title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
Description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

Title: Fact checking the Biden-Trump presidential debate
Description: President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump met for a showdown over policy and their records, but not everything was factual.

Title: WATCH:  93-year-old woman with dementia lights up around her great-grandson
Description: A family shared this touching video on Tiktok showing a 93-year-old woman with dementia who traveled from the U.K. to Australia to meet her great-grandson.

Title: WATCH:  Cat who looked like she had no nose or lips completely transforms with new owners
Description: Miss Kitty had a hyper-allergic reaction to fleas, which severely distorted her face.

Title: WATCH:  Euro 2024 volunteer balances 9 beers on his head
Description: A volunteer at Euro 2024 demonstrated incredible skill, but not of the sporting variety, successfully stacking nine pints of beer on his head and walking around with them.

Title: WATCH:  No boat required: Kids wakeboard down flooded street in Louisiana
Description: Water-logged streets couldn't stop these kids in Louisiana from having fun — the pair proved there's no need for a boat to go wakeboarding.

Title: WATCH:  Hollywood's Walk of Fame set to add music royalty and award winners
Description: Big names in music, TV and film have been chosen to get stepped on. Prince joins actor Courtney B. Vance and TV science guy Bill Nye on the list of entertainers receiving Hollywood stars.

Title: WATCH:  This opera singer performs with a hip-hop flare
Description: Babatunde Akinboboye is a musician and performer who injects modern energy into his opera singing with hip-hop style.

Title: WATCH:  Orioles fan makes one-handed catch
Description: Tim Bryer made an amazing bare-handed catch from the upper deck during the Baltimore Orioles’ game against the Cleveland Guardians in Camden Yards.

Title: WATCH:  Family of bears pays surprise visit to NC family
Description: A North Carolina resident had an adorable surprise when a family of black bears climbed up onto his porch.

Title: WATCH:  Tourist defies warnings, jumps barrier at Yosemite waterfall
Description: A visitor to Yosemite National Park was captured on camera jumping a barrier at the top of the Vernal Falls and posing for a photo at the edge of the 317-foot drop.

Title: WATCH:  Endangered Amur tigers meet for 1st time at safari park
Description: Amur tiger pair Minerva and Dmitri met face-to-face for the first time at Woburn Safari Park this month in front of excited visitors.
